trans-unit.source:
\n

Defines a mechanism for retrieving a service object; that is, an object that provides custom support to other objects.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxxx xx$ xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the service object of the specified type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object that specifies the type of service object to get.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
A service object of type serviceType.

-or-

null if there is no service object of type serviceType.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx $xx$xxxxxxxXxxx$$xx$.$$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx $xx$xxxxxxxXxxx$$xx$.$$x$$x
